welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Kawara, Japan! Known for its tranquil atmosphere and breathtaking landscapes, we invite you to immerse yourself in our city's charm and discover all it has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Kita Kyushu Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Kita Kyushu Airport handles all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Fukuoka Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Fukuoka Airport, primarily serving domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may require registration or login.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Ube Airport handles both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Ube Airport is used for transporting goods and freight.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network by selecting 'Ube Airport WiFi' from their device's WiFi settings.
